title.narrative: Countries enabled to strengthen their health systems to deliver on condition- and disease-specific service coverage results

description.narrative: Improved access to quality essential health services irrespective of gender, age or disability

Strategies and interventions to control and manage specific diseases and conditions through a public health approach; approaches to eliminate 3+ diseases or conditions; implement WHO norms & standards to address conditions and diseases most relevant to the country; key health indicators on communicable and noncommunicable diseases identified and recommended by WHO.

title.narrative: Triple billion targets - tracking the work of WHO, countries, regions and partners to meet the Triple Billion targets and health-related Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Country Cooperation Strategy Brief - Democratic Republic of the Congo (2018)
